mapper.insert: insert into magazine(magazine_id, user_id, travel_id, magazine_title, regist_time, cover_img) values (#{magazineId}, #{userId}, #{travelId}, #{magazineTitle}, now(), #{coverImg})
mapper.select: select magazine_id, user_id, travel_id, magazine_title, reuse_cnt, magazine_hit, magazine_like, cover_img from magazine
select magazine_id, user_id, travel_id, magazine_title, reuse_cnt, magazine_hit, magazine_like, cover_img from magazine order by magazine_hit limit 4
select magazine_id, user_id, travel_id, magazine_title, reuse_cnt, magazine_hit, magazine_like, cover_img from magazine order by regist_time limit 4
